rbc.title: Quality Engineer Co-op
rbc.location:
Royal Bank of Canada - Toronto, ON
May 2025 - August 2025

points.1: Migrated over 30+ APIs from Jenkins to GitHub Actions with Ansible, improving pipeline maintainability and consistency
points.2: Developed and implemented a custom Robot Framework library to extract, validate PDF form data, and handle form variations using regex based comparisons
points.3: Stabilized automated tests in Robot Framework using better keywords and python libraries
points.4: Adapted existing GitHub Actions workflows to ensure seamless deployments during API migration
